00033 bool CLocalOperation::DrawHistogram(CStdImage &Source, CStdImage &Dest)
00034 {
00035 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00036         /* add comment to history */
00037         TString History;
00038         k_InitString(&History);
00039         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sCLocalOperation::DrawHistogram()",ipl_HistoryIndent);
00040         Source.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00041         k_EmptyString(&History);
00042         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00043 #endif
00044         bool ReturnValue=k_DrawHistogram(Source.GetTImagePtr(),Dest.GetTImagePtr());
00045         if (ReturnValue==false)
00046         {
00047                 ostringstream ost;
00048                 ost << "CLocalOperation::DrawHistogram() failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00049                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00050         }
00051 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00052         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00053         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00054         /* remove the history line added to source above */
00055         if (&Source!=&Dest)
00056                 Source.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00057 #endif
00058         return ReturnValue;
00059 }
00060

00089 bool CLocalOperation::NonlinearCopyToByte(CStdImage &Source, float gamma,
00090         int Min,int Max,CStdImage &Dest)
00091 {
00092 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00093         /* add comment to history */
00094         TString History;
00095         k_InitString(&History);
00096         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sCLocalOperation::NonlinearCopyToByte() CStdImage as source "
00097                 "gamma=%f, Min=%d, Max=%d",ipl_HistoryIndent,gamma,Min,Max);
00098         Source.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00099         k_EmptyString(&History);
00100         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00101 #endif
00102         bool ReturnValue=k_NonlinearCopyByteToByte(Source.GetTImagePtr(),gamma,Min,Max,Dest.GetTImagePtr());
00103         if (ReturnValue==false)
00104         {
00105                 ostringstream ost;
00106                 ost << "CLocalOperation::NonlinearCopyToByte() failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00107                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00108         }
00109 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00110         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00111         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00112         /* remove the history line added to source above */
00113         if (&Source!=&Dest)
00114                 Source.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00115 #endif
00116         return ReturnValue;
00117 }
